citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10 pm on
19-Apr-17.
Inspector spoke with licensee who was not available to accompany on the inspection.
